tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>NEW PLAYERS</>
<TextStyle.White>Please take a moment to read and understand the rules outlined in the 'rules' tab.</>

<TextStyle.White>Before You must do the following:</>
<TextStyle.White>1.  Name your character (no human/humano/mens/mensch)</>
<TextStyle.White>1.  Create a tribe.</>
<TextStyle.White>2.  Register on the Discord.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>REGISTRATION</>
<TextStyle.White>The tribe leader must register your tribe. You must include the following information:</>
<TextStyle.White>- Your in-game (IGN) name.</>
<TextStyle.White>- Number of players in your tribe.</>
<TextStyle.White>- Each tribemate's IGN.</>
<TextStyle.White>- Tribe Name.</>
<TextStyle.White>- Map.</>

<TextStyle.White>Once you've finished registering, you are eligible to redeem a PvE Starter Pack, limited to one per person.</>
<TextStyle.White>- 1x Griffin/Owl/Argentavis (your choice)</>
<TextStyle.White>- 1x Metal Hatchet</>
<TextStyle.White>- 1x Metal Pick</>
<TextStyle.White>- 1x Chibi (your choice)</>
<TextStyle.White>- 1x Vault</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>- No harassment or bullying.</>
<TextStyle.White>- No racism or slurs.</>
<TextStyle.White>- No threatening of any kind.</>
<TextStyle.White>- No player picking</>

<TextStyle.White>- Autodecay</>
<TextStyle.White>- Friendly fire disabled</>
<TextStyle.White>- No limit on tribes</>
<TextStyle.White>- Alliance allowed</>
<TextStyle.White>- 20X turret damage</>
